verses.verse: And <WG1161> he looked up <WG308>, and saw <WG1492> the rich men <WG4145> casting <WG906> their <WG846> gifts <WG1435> into <WG1519> the treasury <WG1049>.
And <WG1161> he saw <WG1492> also <WG2532> a certain <WG5100> poor <WG3998> widow <WG5503> casting <WG906> in thither <WG1563> two <WG1417> mites <WG3016>.
And <WG2532> he said <WG2036>, Of a truth <WG230> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> this <WG3778> poor <WG4434> widow <WG5503> hath cast <WG906> in more than <WG4119> they all <WG3956>:

For <WG1063> all <WG537> these <WG3778> have of <WG1537> their <WG846> abundance <WG4052> cast <WG906> in unto <WG1519> the offerings <WG1435> of God <WG2316>: but <WG1161> she <WG3778> <WG846> of <WG1537> her <WG846> penury <WG5303> hath cast <WG906> in all <WG537> the living <WG979> that <WG3739> she had <WG2192>.
And <WG2532> as some <WG5100> spake <WG3004> of <WG4012> the temple <WG2411>, how <WG3754> it was adorned <WG2885> with goodly <WG2570> stones <WG3037> and <WG2532> gifts <WG334>, he said <WG2036>,

As for these things <WG5023> which <WG3739> ye behold <WG2334>, the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064>, in <WG1722> the which <WG3739> there shall <WG863> not <WG3756> be left <WG863> one stone <WG3037> upon <WG1909> another <WG3037>, that <WG3739> shall <WG2647> not <WG3756> be thrown down <WG2647>.

And <WG1161> they asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Master <WG1320>, but <WG3767> when <WG4219> shall <WG2071> these things <WG5023> be <WG2071>? and <WG2532> what <WG5101> sign <WG4592> will there be when <WG3752> these things <WG5023> shall <WG3195> come to pass <WG1096>?

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, Take heed <WG991> that ye be <WG4105> not <WG3361> deceived <WG4105>: for <WG1063> many <WG4183> shall come <WG2064> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, saying <WG3004>, <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> Christ; and <WG2532> the time <WG2540> draweth near <WG1448>: go ye <WG4198> not <WG3361> therefore <WG3767> after <WG3694> them <WG846>. and the time: or, and, The time

But <WG1161> when <WG3752> ye shall hear <WG191> of wars <WG4171> and <WG2532> commotions <WG181>, be <WG4422> not <WG3361> terrified <WG4422>: for <WG1063> these things <WG5023> must <WG1163> first <WG4412> come to pass <WG1096>; but <WG235> the end <WG5056> is not <WG3756> by and by <WG2112>.
Then <WG5119> said he <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Nation <WG1484> shall rise <WG1453> against <WG1909> nation <WG1484>, and <WG2532> kingdom <WG932> against <WG1909> kingdom <WG932>:

And <WG5037> great <WG3173> earthquakes <WG4578> shall be <WG2071> in <WG2596> divers places <WG5117>, and <WG2532> famines <WG3042>, and <WG2532> pestilences <WG3061>; and <WG5037> fearful sights <WG5400> and <WG2532> great <WG3173> signs <WG4592> shall there be <WG2071> from <WG575> heaven <WG3772>.

But <WG1161> before <WG4253> all <WG537> these <WG5130>, they shall lay <WG1911> their <WG846> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> persecute <WG1377> you, delivering <WG3860> you up <WG1519> to the synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> into prisons <WG5438>, being brought <WG71> before <WG1909> kings <WG935> and <WG2532> rulers <WG2232> for <WG1752> my <WG3450> name's <WG3686> sake <WG1752>.
And <WG1161> it shall turn <WG576> to you <WG5213> for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142>.
Settle <WG5087> it therefore <WG3767> in <WG1519> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>, not <WG3361> to meditate before <WG4304> what ye shall answer <WG626>:

For <WG1063> I <WG1473> will give <WG1325> you <WG5213> a mouth <WG4750> and <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678>, which <WG3739> all <WG3956> your <WG5213> adversaries <WG480> shall <WG1410> not <WG3756> be able <WG1410> to gainsay <WG471> nor <WG3761> resist <WG436>.

And <WG1161> ye shall be betrayed <WG3860> both <WG2532> by <WG5259> parents <WG1118>, and <WG2532> brethren <WG80>, and <WG2532> kinsfolks <WG4773>, and <WG2532> friends <WG5384>; and <WG2532> some of <WG1537> you <WG5216> shall they cause to be put to death <WG2289>.
And <WG2532> ye shall be <WG2071> hated <WG3404> of <WG5259> all <WG3956> men for <WG1223> my <WG3450> name's sake <WG3686>.
But <WG2532> there shall not <WG3364> an hair <WG2359> of <WG1537> your <WG5216> head <WG2776> perish <WG622>.
In <WG1722> your <WG5216> patience <WG5281> possess ye <WG2932> your <WG5216> souls <WG5590>.

And <WG1161> when <WG3752> ye shall see <WG1492> Jerusalem <WG2419> compassed <WG2944> with <WG5259> armies <WG4760>, then <WG5119> know <WG1097> that <WG3754> the desolation <WG2050> thereof <WG846> is nigh <WG1448>.

Then <WG5119> let them <WG5343> which are in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449> flee <WG5343> to <WG1519> the mountains <WG3735>; and <WG2532> let them <WG1633> which are in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of it <WG846> depart out <WG1633>; and <WG2532> let <WG1525> not <WG3361> them that are in <WG1722> the countries <WG5561> enter <WG1525> thereinto <WG1519> <WG846>.
For <WG3754> these <WG3778> be <WG1526> the days <WG2250> of vengeance <WG1557>, that all things <WG3956> which <WG3588> are written <WG1125> may be fulfilled <WG4137>.

But <WG1161> woe <WG3759> unto <WG1722> them that are with child <WG1064> <WG2192>, and <WG2532> to them that give suck <WG2337>, in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>! for <WG1063> there shall be <WG2071> great <WG3173> distress <WG318> in <WG1909> the land <WG1093>, and <WG2532> wrath <WG3709> upon <WG1722> this <WG5129> people <WG2992>.

And <WG2532> they shall fall <WG4098> by the edge <WG4750> of the sword <WG3162>, and <WG2532> shall be led away captive <WG163> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484>: and <WG2532> Jerusalem <WG2419> shall be <WG2071> trodden down <WG3961> of <WG5259> the Gentiles <WG1484>, until <WG891> the times <WG2540> of the Gentiles <WG1484> be fulfilled <WG4137>.

And <WG2532> there shall be <WG2071> signs <WG4592> in <WG1722> the sun <WG2246>, and <WG2532> in the moon <WG4582>, and <WG2532> in the stars <WG798>; and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> distress <WG4928> of nations <WG1484>, with <WG1722> perplexity <WG640>; the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> the waves <WG4535> roaring <WG2278>;

Men's <WG444> hearts failing them <WG674> for <WG575> fear <WG5401>, and <WG2532> for looking after <WG4329> those things which are coming on <WG1904> the earth <WG3625>: for <WG1063> the powers <WG1411> of heaven <WG3772> shall be shaken <WG4531>.

And <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall they see <WG3700> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> coming <WG2064> in <WG1722> a cloud <WG3507> with <WG3326> power <WG1411> and <WG2532> great <WG4183> glory <WG1391>.

And <WG1161> when these things <WG5130> begin <WG756> to come to pass <WG1096>, then look up <WG352>, and <WG2532> lift up <WG1869> your <WG5216> heads <WG2776>; for <WG1360> your <WG5216> redemption <WG629> draweth nigh <WG1448>.
And <WG2532> he spake <WG2036> to them <WG846> a parable <WG3850>; Behold <WG1492> the fig tree <WG4808>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the trees <WG1186>;

When <WG3752> they now <WG2235> shoot forth <WG4261>, ye see <WG991> and know <WG1097> of <WG575> your own selves <WG1438> that <WG3754> summer <WG2330> is <WG2076> now <WG2235> nigh at hand <WG1451>.

So <WG3779> likewise <WG2532> ye <WG5210>, when <WG3752> ye see <WG1492> these things <WG5023> come to pass <WG1096>, know ye <WG1097> that <WG3754> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> nigh at hand <WG1451>.
Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, <WG3754> This <WG3778> generation <WG1074> shall <WG3928> not <WG3364> pass away <WG3928>, <WG302> till <WG2193> all <WG3956> be fulfilled <WG1096>.
Heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093> shall pass away <WG3928>: but <WG1161> my <WG3450> words <WG3056> shall <WG3928> not <WG3364> pass away <WG3928>.

And <WG1161> take heed <WG4337> to yourselves <WG1438>, lest at any time <WG3379> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> be overcharged <WG925> with <WG1722> surfeiting <WG2897>, and <WG2532> drunkenness <WG3178>, and <WG2532> cares <WG3308> of this life <WG982>, and <WG2532> so that <WG1565> day <WG2250> come <WG2186> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209> unawares <WG160>.
For <WG1063> as <WG5613> a snare <WG3803> shall it come <WG1904> on <WG1909> all <WG3956> them that dwell <WG2521> on <WG1909> the face <WG4383> of the whole <WG3956> earth <WG1093>.

Watch ye <WG69> therefore <WG3767>, and pray <WG1189> always <WG1722> <WG3956> <WG2540>, that <WG2443> ye may be accounted worthy <WG2661> to escape <WG1628> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023> that shall <WG3195> come to pass <WG1096>, and <WG2532> to stand <WG2476> before <WG1715> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444>.

And <WG1161> in the day time <WG2250> he was <WG2258> teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>; and <WG1161> at night <WG3571> he went out <WG1831>, and abode <WG835> in <WG1519> the mount <WG3735> that is called <WG2564> the mount of Olives <WG1636>.
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> came early in the morning <WG3719> to <WG4314> him <WG846> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, for to hear <WG191> him <WG846>.
